caption.p: (a–h) SEM images of the top surface of NaGd(WO 4) 2:Eu 3+ (a,e), NaGd(MoO 4) 2:Eu 3+ (b,f), LaVO 4:Eu 3+ (c,g), and GdVO 4:Eu 3+ (d,h) nanophosphor films prepared at room temperature (a–d) and annealed at 800 °C (e–h). (i) XRD patterns and (j) normalized photoexcitation (black line) and emission (red line) spectra for the nanophosphor films annealed at 800 °C.
